Description: From apples to asparagus and peaches to peppers, you?ll be well equipped to prepare all kinds of fresh produce with this carefully selected cutlery duo. Use the 3 1/2- inch paring knife for peeling and pitting fruits, mincing shallots, coring tomatoes and creating beautiful garnishes. The 6-inch utility knife is the perfect in-between size for dozens of daily tasks from quartering apples and potatoes to slicing cucumbers and summer squash.
Name: Calphalon Contemporary Cutlery Fruit/Vegetable Set (6" Utility Knife, 3.5" Parer Knife)
